FuncDef:
The vni command adds a VNI to a VNI list.
The undo vni command deletes a VNI from a VNI list. The vni command adds a VNI to a VNI list. The undo vni command deletes a VNI from a VNI list. By default, no VNI is added to a VNI list. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VNI.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.
